name: Chusocol
tagline: A simple, comprehensive and free soundfont collection, focusing on realistic and playable acoustic and orchestral instruments for today's live musicians.
body:
##About ChusoCol
**ChusoCol** is a simple collection of samples that comes from a variety of Open Source resources. It is intended to be simple and quick to use, mainly to its application in **live performances**.

The whole collection is mainly focused in recreating acoustic instruments with a decent level of **realism** while maintaining a relatively **small file size**, so that it can be used in a wide range of equipment, from old laptops to VST hardware players, such as the **Muse Receptor**.

***

##Sources
The collection is a mixture of my own material and a compilation of different resources from the web. The most important sample source has been the [General User's GS Bank](http://www.schristiancollins.com/generaluser.php) by S. Christian Collins. Suplementary material comes from [Jasper Blunk's](http://jasperblunk.com/) webpage (french horn samples) and the sample collection by the [University of Iowa](http://theremin.music.uiowa.edu/MIS.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
